outboundReferences.contextLine: Autoscaling performs [[scale-in-out]], as opposed to scaling up and down.

inboundReferences.contextLine: [[azure-app-service-autoscale]] monitors the resource metrics of a web app as it runs. It detects situations where other resources are required to handle an increasing workload, and ensures those resources are available before the system becomes overloaded.

fields.title: AZ-204 - Developing Solutions for Microsoft Azure
